ip_configuration.description: One or more `ip_configuration` blocks as defined below.

location.description: The location where the Network Interface should exist. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

name.description: The name of the Network Interface. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the Resource Group in which to create the Network Interface. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

dns_servers.description: A list of IP Addresses defining the DNS Servers which should be used for this Network Interface.
